description: Albula HS Pants Men - rain pants for hiking. Environmentally friendly main material made from 100% recycled polyester. Sustainably dyed using a dope-dye method. Comfortable thanks to a pleasant, lightweight, soft and stretchable material. Practical: the rain pants are lightweight and extremely compressible. They can be stowed in the side pocket.
name: Mammut Albula HS Pants, Short - Mens
